Professionally I am an Assistant Research Professor in the Department of
Biomedical Informatics, in the School of Medicine at the University of Colorado
Anschutz Medical Campus.  I work as a biostatistician, data scientist, software
developer, and mentor.

Personally I am a Dad and woodworker.
